name: Hemant Dawande
bio:
Area of Specialization : Computer-Aided Design/ Computer-Aided Manufacturing
Academic History
I am a Ph.D. pursuing scholar in Mechanical Engineering at G H Raisoni University, with an M.Tech degree from the University Institute of Technology, Barkatullah University, Bhopal (2013). I have 12 years of teaching experience and 1 year of industrial experience, demonstrating strong academic, administrative, and leadership competence.
I have effectively served in key academic and administrative positions, including Head of the Department (Mechanical Engineering), Institute Project Coordinator, and Deputy Examination Controller, where I contributed to academic planning, examination management, accreditation activities, and institutional governance. My teaching philosophy focuses on outcome-based education, curriculum development, and student mentoring.
My research interests include CAD/CAM, ontology-based knowledge modeling, product design, manufacturing systems, and joining process selection for plastic assemblies. I have published research in reputed international journals, including “An Ontology-Based Knowledge Framework for Selection of Joining Process in Plastic Assembly” in Materials Today: Proceedings (2024), along with earlier publications on automotive braking materials, thermal conductivity analysis, and regenerative energy systems.
I have participated in numerous AICTE-approved FDPs, STTPs, and national workshops conducted by IIT Kharagpur, IIT Kanpur, IIT Roorkee, IIT Bhilai, and NITTTR (Chennai and Bhopal). I am a Life Member of ISTE and a recipient of the SRIJAN Award 2020 for teaching excellence

name: SONALI RATHORE
bio:
I have over 5 years of teaching experience in higher education. Currently, I am serving as a faculty member at Shri Balaji Institute of Technology & Management, Betul (M.P.), where I have been teaching since 2023. Previously, I worked as a Guest Lecturer at Govt. S.V. Polytechnic College, Bhopal from 2016 to 2018, and as an Assistant Professor at Shashib College of Engineering, Bhopal during 2015–2016.

Research Area

Certifications & FDPs

Completed 18+ Faculty Development Programs (FDP/NFDP/STTP/FIP) in areas including Artificial Intelligence, Cyber Security, GenAI, AWS Cloud, Web Mining, Research Methodology, Computer Forensics, and Quality Engineering, organized by reputed institutions across India in collaboration with ExcelR Edtech, Microsoft Copilot, AWS, NSDC, and CRISP Bhopal.

name: Pramila Gharjale.
bio:
Area of Specialization :- AI & Machine Learning, Cryptography & Network  Security , Web technology.
Academic History: 
I am working as an Assistant Professor in the Department of Computer Science & Engineering with 3.9 years of teaching experience in undergraduate engineering education. I hold a Master’s degree in Computer Science and Engineering and a Bachelor’s degree in Engineering, which has provided me with a strong foundation in computing and modern technologies.
Throughout my academic career, I have taught important subjects such as Python Programming, Discrete Structures, Internet & Web Technology, Machine Learning & Cloud Computing. I focus on student-centered teaching methods, practical learning, and the use of ICT tools to make concepts clear and engaging for students.
In addition to teaching, I have served as a class coordinator, mentor, and subject in-charge, guiding students in their academic progress and personal development. I have also contributed to NAAC, IQAC, and academic documentation activities in my institution.
To keep myself updated with emerging technologies and teaching practices, I regularly participate in Faculty Development Programs (FDPs), workshops, and training programs. With dedication to academic excellence and continuous learning, I strive to contribute effectively to the growth of my students and my institution.

name: Khushabu Parte
bio:
Area of Specialization: Programming & Scripting (Python), Data Science & Machine Learning, Data Visualization 
Academic History:
•	Master of Technology in Data Science 
School of Information & Technology, RGPV Bhopal 
•	Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science Engineering
University Institute of Technology, RGPV Bhopal
Research & Awards:
•	Projects:
•	Cloud-Based Blood Donation System
•	Desktop AI Voice Assistant
•	Superstore Market Data Analysis (Power BI)
•	Data Visualization with Tableau
Certificates:
•	certifications in Data Science – by MentorKart
•	certification in PDAC
•	SolidWrok – MSME
•	Short Term Training program on “Mozilla Add-Ons under TEQIP-3
•	One day Workshop on Safeguards for Woman in Cyberspace –by RGPV

I am Khushabu Parte, an M.Tech graduate in Data Science, with a thesis focused on using blockchain technology to enhance e-voting systems. I have recently started my teaching career, combining my academic knowledge with hands-on project experience. Throughout my academic journey, I’ve developed several projects, including a cloud-based blood donation system, a desktop AI voice assistant, and a supermarket store data visualization analysis using Power BI. I have also worked on various data-driven projects in Tableau, exploring business intelligence and analytics.
In addition to my degree, I hold certifications in Data Science, SolidWorks (from MSME), and PDAC, which have further strengthened my technical expertise. My passion lies in applying advanced technologies like AI, blockchain, CSE, and data analytics to solve real-world problems.

name: BHAVESH KUMAR KHASDEV
bio:
Area of Specialization :- Wireless Communication, Artificial Intelligence 
Academic History, Research & Awards (Maximum 200 words): 
Bhavesh Kumar Khasdev is an academician currently serving as an Assistant Professor at Department of Artificial Intelligence & Data Science Engineering. His work primarily revolves around advanced communication systems and data-driven technologies. His research focuses on AI integration on next-generation telecommunications and computational intelligence, specifically Wireless Communication: Exploring 5G, 6G, and beyond.
Publications
Mr. Bhavesh Khasdev has contributed to several international journals. Notable works include:
•	Overview of MIMO Technology in LTE, LTE-A & LTE-A-Pro (International Journal of Engineering and Computer Science, 2016).
•	Performance Analysis of Adaptive MIMO OFDM System (International Journal of Advanced Research in Electronics and Communication Engineering, 2016).
•	Web-Based Smart Skills and Job Role Mapping System using Data Science and Machine Learning (International Journal of Leading Research Publication, 2025).
•	A Comprehensive Study on Text Detection and Extraction from Images and PDF Documents (International Journal of Innovative Research in Engineering, 2025).
Experience & Activities
•	Teaching Experience: He holds a Dean Academics and Assistant Professor position at SBITM Betul, where he engages in undergraduate instruction since last 14 years.
•	Projects: His recent project work involves the development of automated systems for text extraction and smart job mapping using modern AI techniques.
•	Workshops & Seminars: Participation in more than 20 AICTE approved FDPs in the latest trends in Engineering and Data Science research.
Academic awards or recognitions 
•	Recipient of SRIJAN Best Teacher Award for teaching excellence.
•	NDLI Club President.
qualification: P.hD Pursuing, M.E, B.E in Electronics & Communication Engineering

name: Ashish Gawande
bio:
Area of Specialization - Machine Learning And Cyber law And Information Technology 
Academic History - I am a faculty member in the Department of  Artificial Intelligence And Data Science SBITM, BETUL with 3.3 years of experience in academics. I hold a Master’s degree in Cyber Law and Information Technology from IIIT Allahabad. My research interests include Machine Learning, Deep Learning, and Information Security. My focus is on integrating research-driven learning with practical applications in engineering education.
qualification: Bachelor of Engineering from Jabalpur Engineering   College, Jabalpur  , Master of Technology from IIIT Allahabad

name: Rajesh Barange
bio:
Mr. Rajesh Barange  is an Assistant Professor and Head of the Department of Mechanical Engineering with over 15 years of teaching experience and one year of industrial experience  in a steel plant, which strengthens his practical approach to teaching.

He completed his B.E. in Mechanical Engineering from SSSIST, Sehore  and M.Tech in Mechanical Engineering with specialization in Computer Integrated Manufacturing (CIM) from SATI, Vidisha. His M.Tech thesis was carried out at CSIR–Advanced Materials and Processes Research Institute (AMPRI), Bhopal. He also holds a Post Graduate Diploma in CAD/CAM/CIM from the Indo-German Tool Room, Indore.

He has contributed significantly to academic administration as Head of Department, Departmental Training & Placement Coordinator, NAAC Criteria Coordinator,member of examination cell and member of various institutional committees. His areas of interest include Additive Manufacturing, Advanced Manufacturing Processes, CNC Technology, and CAD/CAM/CIM.

He has guided several undergraduate projects, published research papers in reputed international journals, and actively participates in AICT approved STTPs and FDPs. He promotes industry–institute interaction through industrial visits. He is a member of IAENG, IFERP, and IAAC.

name: ALOK NAGLE
bio:
Area of Specialization : Thermal Engineering 

Academic History, 
 
Alok Nagle holds a Bachelor’s degree in Mechanical Engineering and an M.Tech in Thermal Engineering. He is an Assistant Professor at Shri Balaji Institute of Technology and Management, Betul, with teaching experience in core mechanical and thermal engineering subjects. His research interests include thermal engineering, heat transfer, refrigeration and air conditioning, plate heat exchangers, sustainable energy systems, and phase change materials. He completed his postgraduate project on thermal analysis of pressure drop in plate heat exchangers. He has participated in AICTE–ATAL and industry-sponsored faculty development programs and actively engages in workshops, seminars, and academic activities.
Research paper Work 
PERFORMANCE INVESTIGATION OF A WINDOW AIR CONDITIONER OPERATING WITH R-22 REFRIGERANT

name: Omkar Dhurwey
bio:
Area of Specialization :- HP&TE
Academic History: OMKAR DHURWEY holds a Bachelor’s degree in Mechanical Engineering and an M.Tech in Heat Power &Thermal Engineering. He is an Assistant Professor at Shri Balaji Institute of Technology and Management, Betul,( M.P.) wiith +4 Year teaching experience in core mechanical and thermal engineering subjects. His research interests include Thermal engineering, heat and Mass Transfer, refrigeration and air conditioning, Thermal Engineering & Gas Dynamics. He completed his postgraduate project on Investigation and use of BS VI fuel. He has participated in AICTE–ATAL and industry-sponsored faculty development programs and actively engages in workshops, + 5 international journals and has presented +7 papers in national conferences,seminars.

name: Ms. Meena Sune
bio:
Area of Specialization :- Digital communication
Academic History
Ms. Meena Sune is an accomplished Assistant Professor in the Department of Electrical & Electronics Engineering with over 13 years of academic experience. She holds an M. Tech degree in Digital Communication from Shri Balaji Institute of Technology & Management, Betul, affiliated to RGPV Bhopal, which she completed 10 years ago. She also completed her B. Tech in Electronics & Communication Engineering from Royal College of Technology, Indore, also affiliated with RGPV Bhopal.
Ms. Sune is passionate about digital communication and has specialized expertise in this field. Alongside her academic qualifications, she has actively pursued various certifications to enhance her skills and knowledge. She completed certifications in areas like Universal Human Values from AICTE, Computer Forensics and Cyber Crime from Sadabai Raisoni Women’s College, and Research Methodology from Kamla Nehru Mahavidyalaya, Nagpur. Additionally, she has participated in programs related to Emerging Trends in Science, Engineering, Technology, Humanity, and Management, and AI-Based Research Application & Advancement from SBITM, Betul.
Her interest in emerging technologies is reflected in her certifications in AWS Cloud Fundamentals from Sinhgad Institute of Technology, Lonavala, and she is also a Certified Master Trainer in Drone Service Technician (ELE/Q7003) - v3.0. Ms. Sune’s commitment to continuous learning and professional development ensures she remains at the forefront of technological advancements in the academic world.

name: Mr. Kapil Padlak
bio:
Area of Specialization :- Power Electronics
Academic History
Kapil Padlak is an academic professional with a strong background in electrical and power electronics engineering. He completed his Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech) in Electrical and Electronics Engineering, where he gained a solid foundation in electrical systems, machines, power systems, and electronics. Building on this undergraduate training, he pursued a Master of Technology (M.Tech) in Power Electronics, specializing in advanced power conversion techniques, power semiconductor devices, and energy-efficient electrical systems.
With over 10 years of teaching experience, Kapil Padlak has been actively involved in undergraduate and postgraduate engineering education. His teaching career reflects consistent engagement in delivering core and advanced subjects related to electrical engineering and power electronics, along with mentoring students in academic and practical domains.
He has demonstrated a strong commitment to professional development by participating in numerous ATAL and other Faculty Development Programmes (FDPs), which have enhanced his pedagogical skills, technical knowledge, and exposure to emerging technologies. In addition, he holds a certification as a Battery System Repair Technician(ELE/Q7001)-V2.0 conforming to NSQF Level-4, reflecting his practical expertise and interest in applied aspects of energy storage systems and battery technologies.
Through his academic qualifications, teaching experience, continuous training, and technical certifications, Kapil Padlak has developed a well-rounded academic profile that integrates theoretical knowledge with practical and industry-relevant skills

name: Hemant Kumar Badode
bio:
Area of Specialization :- Construction Technology Management
Academic History

I am currently serving as an Assistant Professor in the Department of Civil Engineering at Shri Balaji Institute of Technology & Management (SBITM), Betul, with 13 years of comprehensive teaching experience. I completed my Bachelor of Engineering (B.E.) in 2012 from Bansal Institute of Science and Technology, Bhopal, and subsequently earned my Master of Technology (M.Tech) degree in 2017 from Rabindranath Tagore University (RNTU), Bhopal.

My postgraduate research work, titled “Enhancement of Soil Stabilisation with the Help of Stone Dust,” reflects my expertise in Geotechnical Engineering and the application of sustainable construction materials. My broader research interests include Environmental Engineering and advanced Geospatial Technologies such as Remote Sensing and GIS.

I am committed to continuous academic and professional development and have successfully completed the AICTE ATAL Academy Online Elementary FDP on “Remote Sensing, GIS, GPS Technologies” organized by Ujjain Engineering College. I have also participated in a Short-Term Course at NIT Jalandhar on “Challenges in Wastewater, Air, and Land Pollution in India.”

With over a decade of academic experience, I am dedicated to fostering holistic student development by integrating core civil engineering principles with emerging technologies and contemporary engineering practices.
